synopsis.text: Full of anticipation for his first taste of romance, Keiki KiryÅ«, an ordinary high school student, receives an anonymous love letter accompanied by a pair of white panties. Eager to identify his secret admirer, he embarks on a quest to uncover the sender's identity among the girls who helped him clean the calligraphy club room. As Keiki's investigation unfolds, he discovers that each potential candidate harbors unique and peculiar perversions, making his search for love far more intriguing and challenging than he ever imagined. Will he successfully uncover the true identity of his 'Cinderella who left behind her panties' and embrace a new romantic adventure?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
